panel.title: Basestack
panel.slogan: The Open-Source Stack for Developers and Startups
panel.description: Transform Your Site Experience: Capture Form Submissions Easily, No Backend Required

content.title: Welcome to Basestack Forms
content.description: Please select your preferred login service below to access your forms. By signing in, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

oauth-account-not-linked.title: Account not linked
oauth-account-not-linked.description: You are already signed in with a different provider linked to the same email address.

not-found.title: This page could not be found
not-found.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

error.title: Opps something went wrong!
error.description: Please try again or contact costumer service.

upgrade.partial: Upgrade to Launch or Scale Plans
upgrade.all: Upgrade to Hobby, Launch or Scale Plans
upgrade.description: Please select the plan you want to upgrade to.

empty.title: Create your first form
empty.description: Create your first form to start receiving submissions!

empty.title: Create your first team
empty.description: Create your first team to start collaborating.

enabled.description: The form is currently disabled. To start receiving submissions and access other functionalities, please enable it.

retention.description: Data retention is currently disabled. To view submissions on this page, navigate to settings, and under the general tab, enable data retention.

empty.title: No Submissions Found
empty.description: No submissions have been found for this form.

delete.success: {count, plural, one {Submission has been deleted successfully.} other {Submissions have been deleted successfully.}}

update.success: {count, plural, one {Submission has been updated successfully.} other {Submissions have been updated successfully.}}

success.block: IP Address has been blocked successfully.
success.unblock: IP Address has been unblocked successfully.

endpoint.title: Form Endpoint
endpoint.description: This URL is specific to your form's API. Send your form submissions here.

guide.title: Setup Guide
guide.description: Discover our detailed guide on how to build and collect form submissions using your front-end code.

step-1.title: Update your form's action attribute to point to your endpoint.
step-1.description: Configure your form action to [{url}] and method to [{method}].

step-2.title: Assign a name attribute to each form field.
step-2.description: All form inputs, including textareas, checkboxes, and radios, should have a 'name' attribute specified, such as [name="example"].

step-3.title: Your form is now set up.
step-3.description: Feel free to use the code below to send a test submission.

step-1.title: Send data using the fetch API in any JavaScript environment.
step-1.description: Ensure the mode on the query string is set to [{mode}] to retrieve the response in JSON format.

step-2.title: Copy and paste this into your JavaScript file.
step-2.description: Feel free to use the code below to send a test submission.

step-1.title: Use this on your React Project to send form data to your endpoint.
step-1.description: Send data using the fetch API and ensure the mode on the query string is set to [{mode}] for retrieving the response in JSON format.

step-2.title: Copy and paste this into your React component.
step-2.description: Feel free to use the code below to send a test submission.

step-1.title: Use this on your Vue Project to send form data to your endpoint.
step-1.description: Send data using the fetch API and ensure the mode on the query string is set to [{mode}] for retrieving the response in JSON format.

step-2.title: Copy and paste this into your Vue component.
step-2.description: Feel free to use the code below to send a test submission.

step-1.title: Use the CURL command to send form data to the endpoint.
step-1.description: Ensure the mode is set to [{mode}] to retrieve the response in JSON format.

step-2.title: Execute the following command in your terminal.
step-2.description: You can use the CURL command below to send a test submission.

form.title: Sample Form
form.description: Try out this form to send submissions to your URL and review them in the submissions tab.

toast.success: Form saved. Please check the "Submissions" tab for further details.

support.title: Examples and Demos
support.description: Explore the links below to view examples and demos of forms that you can use to test your endpoint.

avatar.title: User Name
avatar.description: Update user details through your service provider.

modals.title: Customize Modal Behavior
modals.description: Dismiss the modal automatically upon clicking outside the main content area.

theme.title: Choose a Theme
theme.description: Toggle Between Light and Dark Modes for a Personalized Experience.

endpoints.title: Endpoints
endpoints.description: Endpoints are essential for the SDKs to access and interact with features.

form-key.title: Form ID
form-key.description: Here is your form ID, which you can use to integrate and access the features in your websites.

form.title: Delete Form
form.description: Deleting the form will permanently remove all its submissions.
form.placeholder: Warning: This action is irreversible. Proceed with caution.

modal.title: Are you sure about this action?
modal.description: Warning: This action cannot be undone. It will permanently delete the {name} form.

form.title: Form Name
form.description: A name used to identify your form on the dashboard.

owner.title: Form Owner
owner.description: The owner of the form, contact them if you need to update the form.

enable-form.title: Enable Form
enable-form.description: Activate/Deactivate the form to control submission collection.

data-retention.title: Data Retention
data-retention.description: Store incoming submissions in the Basestack Forms database.

webhook-url.title: Webhook URL
webhook-url.description: Each time a new form submission is received, JSON data will be sent to the specified URL.

emails.title: Emails
emails.description: Send submission notifications to these email addresses.
emails.text: Press Enter to add an email in the input field.

spam-protection.title: Spam AI ✨
spam-protection.description: Our AI detects and filters out spam submissions. Data Retention needs to be enabled for the AI to work.

ip-block-rules.title: IP Block Rules
ip-block-rules.description: List IP addresses to block; Basestack Forms will reject messages from those addresses.
ip-block-rules.text: Press Enter to add an IP address in the input field.

honeypot.title: Honeypot
honeypot.description: If this field is present in the submission data, it will be ignored, and an error will be returned.
honeypot.text: A Honeypot field is a hidden field that is added to a form to catch bots without the user knowing.

websites.title: Websites
websites.description: Add websites to restrict form submissions to only those originating from the specified URLs.
websites.text: Press Enter to add a website in the input field. Example: https://www.example.com

success-url.title: Custom Success URL
success-url.description: After a successful form submission, users will be directed to your custom URL.

failed-url.title: Custom Failed URL
failed-url.description: After a failed form submission, users will be directed to your custom URL.

redirect-url.title: Custom Redirect URL
redirect-url.description: After submitting the form, users will be provided with the option to return to the specified URL.

data-query-string.title: Form Data as Query String
data-query-string.description: Pass submission data through query parameters. The return URL will be dynamically populated with the submitted form data.

invite.title: Team Members
invite.description: Add members to manage this project. Developers can also be invited to access API keys for code integration.
invite.placeholder: You need to create a team before you can add members.
